attributes.additional_details: The UK Government to stop the high rates of intrest chaged by some leanders whom land money to those least able to afford them. The rates of between 500% and some going to 1799% pa are outrageuss these landers should be stopped now and all moneys paid in intrest should returned to the borrower. Those who use the service,s these landers offer are the Least able to afford the rates that are charged and are being prayed upon be these landers who should be bought to task by the Government
